dialog: Pray tell, how much would the charge for an excess of baggage be?
Twenty-two galleons.
Here you are, sir.
This is your voucher, sir. You may collect your belongings with it upon your return. Safe travels!
Thank you kindly!
On what date do you desire to depart, sir?
Might you have any available seats on the 16th of September?
Let us see... I'm afraid the 16th is fully booked. However, I have seats available on the 17th.
The 17th shall be acceptable.
And when might you be returning, sir?
Hmmm... I believe it shall be the 28th.
Very well, you are booked on American Airlines flight 710, departing from JFK at 6.
Excellent, thank you very much.
I seek to purchase a black suit.
Might you have any specific brands in mind, miss?
No, I rarely wear suits in my daily life. I require one for my sister's wedding ceremony.
I see. Might I suggest this one? It is quite inexpensive, however, it may not endure long.
Though it appears quite handsome. May I try it on?
Very well, the mirror is over there.
How may I be of assistance, miss?
